actions.Force Bolt: Ranged Spell Attack: +7+1d6 + 4 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) force damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, the inquisitor can push it up to 10 feet away.
actions.Silver Longsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d6 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) if used with two hands, plus 18 (4d8) force damage.
actions.Innate Spellcasting (Psionics): The inquisitor casts one of the following spells, requiring no components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15+1d6 + 12):
actions.Implode (Recharge 4xe2x80x936): Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point the inquisitor can see within 120 feet of it must succeed on a DC 15+1d6 + 12 Constitution saving throw or take 31 (6d8 + 4) force damage and be knocked prone and moved to the unoccupied space closest to the sphere's center. Large and smaller objects that aren't being worn or carried in the sphere automatically take the damage and are similarly moved.
